import sys

n, m = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
w, c = [], []

for i in range(n):
    w.append(int(sys.stdin.readline().split()[0]))
    c.append(int(sys.stdin.readline().split()[0]))

w.sort()
c.sort()

i, j = 0, n - 1
ans = 0

while i < n and j >= 0:
    if w[i] + w[j] <= m:
        ans += c[j]
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    elif w[i] <= m:
        ans += c[j]
        i += 1
    else:
        j -= 1

print(ans)

import sys

n, m = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
w = []
c = []
for i in range(n):
    w.append(int(sys.stdin.readline().split()[0]))
    c.append(int(sys.stdin.readline().split()[0]))

w.sort()
c.sort()

i = 0
j = n - 1
res = 0
while i < n and j >= 0:
    if w[i] + w[j] <= m:
        res += c[j]
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    elif w[i] <= m:
        res += c[j]
        m -= w[i]
        i += 1
    else:
        j -= 1

print(res)
